content: the pattern uses worsted weight yarn and size 5 mm size 8 us single pointed knitting needles it s knit flat and you can either use self-striping yarn or use different shades of yarn to make this toque i indicate where to change the colours of yarn in the pattern so there isn t any confusion but please note you can knit the beanie in one solid colour also there s no reason why you can t this tuque is in adult sizes only it is not knit in the traditional way by casting on stitches to go around your head it s knit from the side each row runs from the forehead to the top up to the crown of the head or to the pom pom this is what makes the stripes vertical instead of the usual horizontal ones on all the other winter hats out there the pattern is free to read row by row on my website here - **free knitting pattern winter beanie toque or touque or tuque with vertical stripes** 1 i have a bunch of other patterns you can read for free online to see all my knitting patterns i have available click on the following link **free knitting patterns** 2 like all my patterns you have my permission to buy give away or keep any of the physical items you make you are not permitted to redistribute or copy this pattern in any way 1 https //kweenbee com/free-knitting-pattern-winter-beanie-toque-or-touque-or-tuque-with-vertical-stripes/ 2 https //kweenbee com/free-knitting-patterns/
